channel.title: Looking for a solid team
channel.description:
What I'm looking for, -3-5 people including me to be apart of the team. -If you're horrible at java, or a java guru doesn't matter just someone who's dedicated -Mature, responsible, intelligent people
I know a fair amount of Java and am willing to try this. I have a vps and a website already, which will be given out upon status of application .
[b]About the server[/b] [u][i]Features[/i][/u]
[ul][li]24/7[/li] [li]No Lagg[/li] [li]Unique items[/li] [li]Unique minigames[/li] [li]Membership system[/li] [li]Membership World[/li] [li]Donator, Super Donator, Ultra Donator, VIP[/li] [li]Each set of donators has its own set of armor that they can equip[/li] [li]Owner, admin and moderator armor that only staff have access to[/li] [li]Very stable economy[/li] [li]Flawless combat nvn, pvp, pvm[/li][/ul]
[b]There's plenty of things that need to be working on and sorted out, I'm all ears for new ideas. PM if any questions. I will add you on skype if you are accepted, remember i'm not a pro and this is not an amazing base. However, I want to make something out it and learn in the process. It's a simple base, i added multiple things to it already and fixed some bugs/dupes. But there's a lot more to be done. thank you and goodluck, and for those just learning feel free to join! [/b]
Application:
[ul][li]Name[/li] [li]Skype[/li] [li]Position you desire[/li] [li]About yourself[/li][/ul]

item.title: Looking for a solid team
item.dc:creator: @Project_Territh Project Territh
item.description:
@Project_Territh wrote:

What I’m looking for,
-3-5 people including me to be apart of the team.
-If you’re horrible at java, or a java guru doesn’t matter just someone who’s dedicated
-Mature, responsible, intelligent people

I know a fair amount of Java and am willing to try this. I have a vps and a website already, which will be given out upon status of application .

About the server
Features

[ul][li]24/7[/li]
[li]No Lagg[/li]
[li]Unique items[/li]
[li]Unique minigames[/li]
[li]Membership system[/li]
[li]Membership World[/li]
[li]Donator, Super Donator, Ultra Donator, VIP[/li]
[li]Each set of donators has its own set of armor that they can equip[/li]
[li]Owner, admin and moderator armor that only staff have access to[/li]
[li]Very stable economy[/li]
[li]Flawless combat nvn, pvp, pvm[/li][/ul]

There’s plenty of things that need to be working on and sorted out, I’m all ears for new ideas. PM if any questions. I will add you on skype if you are accepted, remember i’m not a pro and this is not an amazing base. However, I want to make something out it and learn in the process. It’s a simple base, i added multiple things to it already and fixed some bugs/dupes. But there’s a lot more to be done. thank you and goodluck, and for those just learning feel free to join!

Application:

[ul][li]Name[/li]
[li]Skype[/li]
[li]Position you desire[/li]
[li]About yourself[/li][/ul]
